effects: Increase ATK by 30% and HP by 20%
Increase ATK by 20% when equipped with a Fist
Increase equipment ATK by 50% when armed with a single one-handed weapon
Increase Accuracy by 25% when armed with a single one-handed weapon
name: Fists of Fire

desc_short.0: Boost HP by 20%, ATK by 30%, boost ATK when equipped with fists, and boost ATK when equipped with a one-handed weapon with the other hand empty
desc_short.5: Aumenta la VIT un 20%, el ATQ un 30%, aumenta el ATQ al usar los puños y también aumenta el ATQ al tener un arma de una mano y nada en la otra
